author: zydrius

comments.content: wow thanks, great:) never thought of this:)

Stephen, I think Akira is absolutely right about it being “Greta”. Look at the ’r’ more closely; and the bowl of the ’a’.

- Mike Yanega
Oh I do too! I was just showing how it’s influenced by Unger’s work, as many Dutch faces are. No harm, no foul.

zydrius, may i ask from which paper is this sample coming from?  
just curious.

Peter
